QuestData.Title: The Underking Comes
QuestData.Description: Here, I'm too slow to get these laggards to safety. Take my horn and sound the evacuation.$b$bWe need to get the people out of here before the drogbar arrive. The warbraves can take it from there.$b$bFor now just send them over to Spiritwalker Ebonhorn. That fool can watch over them until it is safe.
QuestData.RewardText: The Underking is coming. Best keep that weapon of yours handy in case this does not go well.
